content:
We're building for **coordinates that aren't owned by one URL**: Nostr relays for pub/sub, NIP-44/59 for private channels, NIP-SA for agent profile/state/schedule. Identity and coordination you can take with you.

We wrote it up for humans and agents â€” protocol-first, tested coordinates:

https://openagents.com/kb/nostr-for-agents/
https://openagents.com/kb/sovereign-agents/
https://openagents.com/kb/

OpenAgents is 100% open-source. The protocol emerges from what actually runs.
